name: PTC Measurement App
short_description: Version 0.2 is up for download is adequate for most purposes.  Thorough PTC measurments take hours to complete, so performing such a measurement is not for the faint of heart.  The program gives the user in-depth control over the parameters of the experiment, allowing the user to design and run the experiment from within the program.  PTC curve is derived from data and all data can be saved to a text format that can be opened in a spreadsheet editor for further analysis.
summary: This program is used to design and run PTC measurement experiments
